verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> concerning <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> concerning the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H8085>publish,<s%> and set <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>standard;<s%> <S%H8085>publish,<s%> and <S%H3582>don't<s%> conceal: <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H3920>taken,<s%> <S%H1078>Bel<s%> is <S%H3001>disappointed,<s%> <S%H4781>Merodach<s%> is <S%H2865>dismayed;<s%> her <S%H6091>images<s%> are <S%H3001>disappointed,<s%> her <S%H1544>idols<s%> are <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>

For out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> there comes <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> against <S%H7896>her,<s%> which shall make her <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate,<s%> and none shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H5110>therein:<s%> they are fled, they are <S%H1980>gone,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal.<s%>

In those <S%H3117>days,<s%> and in that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> they and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> they shall <S%H1980>go<s%> on their <S%H3212>way<s%> <S%H1058>weeping,<s%> and shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

They shall <S%H7592>inquire<s%> <S%H1870>concerning<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2008>turned<s%> toward <S%H935>it,<s%> saying, Come, and <S%H3867>join<s%> yourselves to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that shall not be <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

My <S%H5971>people<s%> have been <S%H6>lost<s%> <S%H6629>sheep:<s%> their <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> have caused them to go <S%H8582>astray;<s%> they have turned them <S%H7725>away<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> they have <S%H1980>gone<s%> from <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H1389>hill;<s%> they have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> their resting <S%H7258>place.<s%>

All who <S%H4672>found<s%> them have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H6862>them;<s%> and their adversaries <S%H559>said,<s%> We are not <S%H816>guilty,<s%> because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> even <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H4723>hope<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H5110>Flee<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and be as the male <S%H6260>goats<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks.<s%>

<S%H5927>For,<s%> behold, I will stir up and cause to come <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H894>Babylon<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country;<s%> and they shall set themselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> against <S%H3920>her;<s%> from there she shall be taken: their <S%H2671>arrows<s%> shall be as of an expert <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H7919>man;<s%> none shall <S%H7725>return<s%> in <S%H7387>vain.<s%>
<S%H3778>Chaldea<s%> shall be a <S%H7998>prey:<s%> all who <S%H7997>prey<s%> on her shall be <S%H7646>satisfied,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Because you are <S%H8055>glad,<s%> because you <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> O you who <S%H8154>plunder<s%> my <S%H5159>heritage,<s%> because you are <S%H6335>wanton<s%> as a <S%H5697>heifer<s%> that treads out the <S%H1877>grain,<s%> and <S%H6670>neigh<s%> as strong <S%H47>horses;<s%>

your <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be <S%H3966>utterly<s%> <S%H954>disappointed;<s%> she who <S%H3205>bore<s%> you shall be <S%H2659>confounded:<s%> <S%H319>behold,<s%> she shall be the least of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> a dry <S%H6723>land,<s%> and a <S%H6160>desert.<s%>

Because of the <S%H7110>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> she shall not be <S%H3427>inhabited,<s%> but she shall be wholly <S%H8077>desolate:<s%> everyone who <S%H5674>goes<s%> by <S%H894>Babylon<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and <S%H8319>hiss<s%> at all her <S%H4347>plagues.<s%>

Set yourselves in <S%H6186>array<s%> against <S%H894>Babylon<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%> all you who <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow;<s%> <S%H3034>shoot<s%> at <S%H2550>her,<s%> spare no <S%H2671>arrows:<s%> for she has <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7321>Shout<s%> against her all <S%H5439>around:<s%> she has <S%H5414>submitted<s%> <S%H3027>herself;<s%> her <S%H803>bulwarks<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> her <S%H2346>walls<s%> are thrown <S%H2040>down;<s%> for it is the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> take <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> on <S%H6213>her;<s%> as she has done, do to <S%H6213>her.<s%>

Cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2232>sower<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and him who <S%H8610>handles<s%> the <S%H4038>sickle<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest:<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> they shall <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his own <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> is a <S%H6340>hunted<s%> <S%H7716>sheep;<s%> the <S%H738>lions<s%> have driven him <S%H5080>away:<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H314>him;<s%> and now at last <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has broken his <S%H6105>bones.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H6485>Behold,<s%> I will punish the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and his <S%H776>land,<s%> as I have <S%H6485>punished<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to his <S%H5116>pasture,<s%> and he shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> on <S%H3760>Carmel<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> on the <S%H2022>hills<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and in <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

In those <S%H3117>days,<s%> and in that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be sought <S%H1245>for,<s%> and there shall be <S%H2403>none;<s%> and the sins of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and they shall not be <S%H4672>found:<s%> for I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> them whom I leave as a <S%H7604>remnant.<s%>

Go <S%H5927>up<s%> against the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4850>Merathaim,<s%> even against <S%H3427>it,<s%> and against the inhabitants of <S%H6489>Pekod:<s%> <S%H2717>kill<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5002>them,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that I have commanded <S%H6680>you.<s%>
A <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H4421>battle<s%> is in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>destruction.<s%>

How is the <S%H6360>hammer<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> cut <S%H1438>apart<s%> and <S%H7665>broken!<s%> how is <S%H894>Babylon<s%> become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations!<s%>

I have laid a <S%H3369>snare<s%> for <S%H3920>you,<s%> and you are also taken, <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and you <S%H3045>weren't<s%> aware: you are <S%H4672>found,<s%> and also <S%H8610>caught,<s%> because you have <S%H1624>striven<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6605>opened<s%> his <S%H214>armory,<s%> and has brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of his <S%H2195>indignation;<s%> for the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> has a <S%H4399>work<s%> to do in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

<S%H935>Come<s%> against her from the utmost <S%H7093>border;<s%> <S%H6605>open<s%> her <S%H3965>storehouses;<s%> cast her <S%H5549>up<s%> as <S%H6194>heaps,<s%> and destroy her <S%H2763>utterly;<s%> let nothing of her be <S%H7611>left.<s%>

<S%H2717>Kill<s%> all her <S%H6499>bulls;<s%> let them go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter:<s%> <S%H1945>woe<s%> to <S%H3117>them!<s%> for their day has <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation.<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of those who <S%H5127>flee<s%> and escape <S%H6405>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> to <S%H5046>declare<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> of his <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

Call <S%H8085>together<s%> the <S%H7228>archers<s%> against <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> all those who <S%H1869>bend<s%> the <S%H7198>bow;<s%> <S%H2583>encamp<s%> against her all <S%H5439>around;<s%> let none of it <S%H6413>escape:<s%> <S%H7999>recompense<s%> her according to her <S%H6467>work;<s%> according to all that she has <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H2102>her;<s%> for she has been proud against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> against the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore her young <S%H970>men<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> in her <S%H7339>streets,<s%> and all her <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> will be brought to <S%H1826>silence<s%> in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H2087>Behold,<s%> I am against you, you proud <S%H5002>one,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies;<s%> for your <S%H3117>day<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I will visit <S%H6485>you.<s%>

The <S%H2087>proud<s%> one shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and none shall raise him <S%H6965>up;<s%> and I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in his <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> all who are around <S%H5439>him.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> are <S%H6231>oppressed<s%> <S%H3162>together;<s%> and all who took them <S%H7617>captive<s%> hold them <S%H2388>fast;<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go.<s%>

Their <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is <S%H2389>strong;<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is his <S%H8034>name:<s%> he will <S%H7378>thoroughly<s%> <S%H7378>plead<s%> their <S%H7379>cause,<s%> that he may give <S%H7280>rest<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7264>disquiet<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

A <S%H2719>sword<s%> is on the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and on her <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and on her wise <S%H2450>men.<s%>
A <S%H2719>sword<s%> is on the <S%H907>boasters,<s%> and they shall become <S%H2973>fools;<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is on her mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> and they shall be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>

A <S%H2719>sword<s%> is on their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and on their <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and on all the mixed <S%H6153>people<s%> who are in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H802>her;<s%> and they shall become as women: a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is on her <S%H214>treasures,<s%> and they shall be <S%H962>robbed.<s%>

A <S%H2721>drought<s%> is on her <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and they shall be dried <S%H3001>up;<s%> for it is a <S%H776>land<s%> of engraved <S%H6456>images,<s%> and they are <S%H1984>mad<s%> over <S%H367>idols.<s%>

Therefore the wild animals of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> with the <S%H338>wolves<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H1323>there,<s%> and the ostriches shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H3427>therein:<s%> and it shall be no more inhabited <S%H5331>forever;<s%> neither shall it be <S%H7931>lived<s%> in from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

As when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and the <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> cities of <S%H5002>it,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> so shall no <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H1121>there,<s%> neither shall any son of <S%H120>man<s%> live <S%H1481>therein.<s%>

<S%H5971>Behold,<s%> a people <S%H935>comes<s%> from the <S%H6828>north;<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall be stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> from the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

They lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> on <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H3591>spear;<s%> they are <S%H394>cruel,<s%> and have no <S%H7355>mercy;<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H1993>roars<s%> like the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> and they <S%H7392>ride<s%> on <S%H5483>horses,<s%> everyone set in <S%H6186>array,<s%> as a <S%H376>man<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> against <S%H1323>you,<s%> daughter of <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8088>news<s%> of <S%H3027>them,<s%> and his hands wax <S%H7503>feeble:<s%> <S%H6869>anguish<s%> has taken <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H2427>him,<s%> pains as of a woman in <S%H3205>labor.<s%>

<S%H5927>Behold,<s%> the enemy shall come up like a <S%H738>lion<s%> from the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> against the <S%H386>strong<s%> <S%H5116>habitation:<s%> for I will <S%H7280>suddenly<s%> <S%H7323>make<s%> them run <S%H7323>away<s%> from <S%H977>it;<s%> and whoever is chosen, him will I <S%H6485>appoint<s%> over <S%H3259>it:<s%> for who is like me? and who will appoint me a time? and who is the <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> who can <S%H5975>stand<s%> before <S%H6440>me?<s%>

Therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that he has <S%H3289>taken<s%> against <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> and his <S%H4284>purposes,<s%> that he has <S%H2803>purposed<s%> against the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> Surely they shall drag them <S%H5498>away,<s%> even the <S%H6810>little<s%> ones of the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> surely he shall make their <S%H5116>habitation<s%> desolate over <S%H8074>them.<s%>
At the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8610>taking<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembles,<s%> and the <S%H2201>cry<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
